casebody.data:
2016-0971 (La. 9/16/16)

James H. HOOPER, Jr., et al. v. HERO LANDS COMPANY, et al. NO. 2016-C-0971 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 16, 2016

Applying For Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Plaquemines, 25th Judicial District Court Div. A, No. 59-740; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2015-CA-0929

Denied.

HUGHES, J., would grant.
